meanings.definition: A person who avidly follows trends in fashion, music, or popular culture.
meanings.sent1: She is such a trendoids, always wearing the latest styles.
meanings.sent2: The trendoids at the concert all had similar outfits.
meanings.sent3: The trendoids decided to wear neon colors to a black-tie event, causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of trendoids, she stood out like a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The trendoids in the group made sure everyone knew they were up-to-date with the latest trends.

meanings.definition: The act of conforming to or following trends in fashion, music, or popular culture.
meanings.sent1: His trendoids were evident in his choice of clothing.
meanings.sent2: The trendoids of the group all started wearing bucket hats.
meanings.sent3: The trendoids of the office decided to have a 'Mismatch Day' where everyone wore clashing outfits.
meanings.sent4: Following the trendoids blindly led to a lack of individuality.
meanings.sent5: The trendoids of the school set the tone for what was considered cool.
